text: Stanislas Charles de Troye (28 January 1770 â€“ 29 December 1844) was a Dutch politician from Mons, that was at the time of his birth a city within Habsburg Netherlands (now Belgium). He held various administrative positions and was a landowner in Thuin. In the United Kingdom of the Netherlands he served for Charleroi as a member of the 1815 Assemblee of notables and for Henegouwen as a member of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands from 1815 to 1820. De Troye died in Thuin on 29 December 1844, at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1770 births Category:1844 deaths Category:Dutch politicians Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands
title: Stanislas Charles de Troye
